sentences: Ma olen soovinud seda raamatut juba ammu.
Ta on alati soovinud reisida maailma Ã¼mber.
Nende laste vanemad on soovinud neile parimat haridust.
context: The word 'soovinud' is the past participle form of the Estonian verb 'soovima', which means to wish or desire something. It is commonly used in sentences to express a past desire or longing for something.
